Trigger.Name: Trigger Listener
Trigger.RegularExpression: Perfect Alexander readies The Final Word.

Trigger.Name: Final Word Buff
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[a-zA-Z'\- ]+) gains the effect of Final Word: (?<debuff>[a-zA-Z'\- ]+) from .* for 10.00 Seconds

Dark Master Go to Bravo Edge

Two Opposite CC, third puddle look middle
Five CC side cardinal, first puddle look outside
Six BJ side cardinal, first puddle look middle
Seven CC side cardinal, second puddle look outside
Eight BJ side cardinal, second puddle look middle

Two, Opposite Cruise Chaser, third void, look middle
